As WINDLORD and RAT TRAP ready themselves they hear a roar and then a
large shape stepped out of the brush - A BEAR!!

The bear was large, standing almost seven feet tall, and it looked to
weigh several hundred pounds at least. It was a GRIZZLY BEAR!

The GRIZZLY did not seem happy that his home had been taken over by
the two MAXIMALS!

(TAG)

- Preston
